caption.title: Change in ambient air pollution concentrations.
caption.p: Maps of the percentage change in (a) PM 2.5 and (b) O 3 from the warm mid-century climate-only (MCCO) scenario to the warm mid-century adaptation (MCA) scenario. Red shows concentrations that are greater in the MCA scenario compared to MCCO, while blue shows a decrease in concentrations compared to MCCO. Axes show latitude and longitude.
